pull.title: don't run ThreadMessageHandler at lowered priority
pull.body:
There's no clear reason ThreadMessageHandler should be low priority.
Fixes #8010 (priority inversion).

milestone.title: 0.12.branch
milestone.description: There won't be a release after the 0.12.1, but bugfixes can still go to the 0.12 branch
